fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you kill a member of the Coven, the next night, you will commit suicide out of guilt.
- You may only shoot thrice.
- Your kills appear to be from a random role with Vigilante in the name. You know which role this is.
- With the Necronomicon, you gain infinite bullets.
- You have Basic defense against Vampires and, if they try to bite you, you shoot them 2719489384 times.
